definition: a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]

sentences.english: The verification and measurement plan of checking fixture dimension should be confirmed by YFV engineer.
sentences.chinese: 检具的尺寸验证测量计划需得到延锋工程师的确认。

sentences.english: Deciding microwave anechoic chamber dimensions in terms of measurement project and EUT(equipment under test) dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 根据测试项目和被测件的大小，决定暗室的尺寸。

sentences.english: But go in knowing your general size and measurements.
sentences.chinese: 但要知道你的普遍尺码和量度尺寸。

sentences.english: Velour provides extra softness and size.
sentences.chinese: 丝绒质地更加柔软，尺寸也更大。

sentences.english: Explanation: string of woven by a certain size of mesh structure flake braid.
sentences.chinese: 由网线编织成的一定尺寸网目结构的片状编织物。

sentences.english: The F14 offers compact package dimensions and a pluggable pin header.
sentences.chinese: 在女性14例提供了紧凑的封装尺寸和可插入针。

sentences.english: A trolley equipment for rail profile measurement is developed.
sentences.chinese: 研制了一种手推式钢轨外形几何尺寸测量系统。

sentences.english: This jacket comes in three sizes.
sentences.chinese: 本店这种茄克有三种尺寸。

sentences.english: Decide microwave anechoic chamber dimensions in terms of measurement project and EUT (equipment under test) dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 根据测试项目和被测件的大小，决定暗室的尺寸。

sentences.english: Let me take your measurements first. You can come and try it on in three days.
sentences.chinese: 我先给你量一下尺寸，三天以后来试样子。

sentences.english: Sewasless steel tube is made in sizes for 1/8 to 24 inches.
sentences.chinese: 无缝钢管制作的尺寸从八分之一寸到二十四寸。

sentences.english: Allometry is the term used to describe the effect of size on bodily proportions and functions(R. M. Alexander1971).
sentences.chinese: 异速生长是用来描述身体比例和功能的尺寸的术语。

sentences.english: Cotton embroidered vest, cotton vest, size according to customer requirements.
sentences.chinese: 棉线马夹，尺寸大小可根据客户要求定做。

sentences.english: Think of a battery as a bottle for energy, and the power density as the size of the bottle’s neck.
sentences.chinese: 想象电池是一个能量瓶，电能密度就是瓶颈的尺寸。

sentences.english: These furnaces are available from lab-scale size to fully automated production systems.
sentences.chinese: 有适合实验室用的尺寸和全自动生产系统两种。

sentences.english: Using spaces to line up code adds to the size.
sentences.chinese: 使用空格来排列代码让文件尺寸增加。

definition: texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
inch (unit of length equal to 2.54 cm.)
model (particular version of a manufactured article)/type (product specification in terms of color, size etc)
